title: Passenger vehicle sales fall for first time in over two years in July
description: While sales of small cars, sedans and hatchbacks declined last month, utility vehicles, which includes both sport-utility vehicles (SUVs) and multipurpose vehicles (MPVs) like Ertiga and Innova, grew in modest single digits in July.
